sentence: Ecolab Inc. ( ECL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on June 13, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.275 per share is scheduled to be paid on July 15, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased ECL stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that ECL has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $109.33, the dividend yield is 1.01%.
The previous trading day's last sale of ECL was $109.33, representing a -2.23% decrease from the 52 week high of $111.83 and a 32.39% increase over the 52 week low of $82.58.
ECL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
ECL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.24.
Zacks Investment Research reports ECL's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as 17.96%, compared to an industry average of 16.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ECL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
